text: Jusztin Nándor Takács (15 January 1927 - 11 July 2016) was a Hungarian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Rábacsanak, Hungary. He served as the Bishop of Székesfehérvár from 1991 until his retirement in 2003. Takács died on 11 July 2016 from complications of pneumonia in Székesfehérvár, Hungary, aged 89.Elhunyt Dr. Takács Nándor Jusztin kármelita szerzetes, nyugalmazott székesfehérvári püspök ==References== ==Other websites== * Bishop Jusztin Nándor Takács, O.C.D. title: Jusztin Nándor Takács
